name: Data Structures
content: Focuses on fundamental data structures (arrays, linked lists, trees, graphs, etc.)

name: Operating Systems
content: Explores the principles and components of operating systems

name: Database Management Systems
content: Covers the design, implementation, and management of databases

name: IT Governance and Compliance
content: Explores frameworks and practices for ensuring the effective and ethical use of information technology in organizations
